title: WTB: a Cycle AB or Tolstoi back
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: WTB: a Cycle AB or Tolstoi back
posts.post_content: Looking to add a new Cycle, AB no frame or Tolstoi to the collection. Looking for something in the 2 - 4 grade range and wanting to stay at $150 or below price range. PM and let me know what you got.  Thanks
